page.title: 05 A SCHOOL MATRON IN BRUTON.
page.content: Mrs Q.Davies is matron for Lisbury boarding house.She has been working for Sexey's School for twenty-seven years but she has not working at Lisbury House all her life.She used to work at Cliff boarding house.She has been a matron for twenty-two years but she started as a cleaner.She lives in Bruton,a small town.She remembers when it used to have a bacon factory and an iron foundry.There have been new industries started up since she has lived in Bruton.She told us that over the past five years there has been a big flood.This can be shown by the mark of the church wall. During her time at Sexey's School there have been many changes,from a boys' school to a co-educational,fully boarding,school.
